channel.title: Moparscape web host
channel.description: Hey there, I was looking into smf forums and so far, I cant find a web hoster who can support smf... what is a web host that supports smf? thanks

item.title: Moparscape web host
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“prison190, post:6, topic:399970”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=497071.msg3634663#msg3634663 date=1308513550]

Your a retard, every webhost that offers PHP and MySQL support SMF which is pretty much every host

Just cant be fucked installing yourself? Gtfo

Maybe he was having some problems with the webhost he was trying, so shush.

OT: You can use HostGator or SMF’s as Andrew was saying, I’m sure there is quite a lot that does support the software without bugs and what not.
[/quote]

What i meant to say is that i dont want to use smf for free because i want a website package all in one, so i guess i will just use host gator thanks anyways :)[/quote]
Go to simplemachines.org for that mate, and use a web host such as Host Gator.

Read full topic
